subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Henrik Kristoffersen finished 0.61 of a second ahead of Marcel Hirscher of Austria, becoming only the fourth man to have won six slaloms in a World Cup season.
snippet: Henrik Kristoffersen finished 0.61 of a second ahead of Marcel Hirscher of Austria, becoming only the fourth man to have won six slaloms in a World Cup season.
